SELECT sud.id AS rId,su.id AS userId, su.name AS userName, su.account AS account,su.phone AS phone FROM sys_user su INNER JOIN sys_emp se ON su.id=se.id AND se.org_id=#{orgId} INNER JOIN sys_user_depart sud on su.id = sud.user_id AND sud.dep_id=#{deptId} WHERE su.status != 2
AND (su.account LIKE CONCAT('%'#{keyword},'%') OR su.name LIKE CONCAT('%'#{keyword},'%') OR su.phone LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%'))
ORDER BY su.id DESC

SELECT sud.dep_id AS depId, sd.depart_name AS depName, sud.user_id AS userId FROM sys_user_depart sud INNER JOIN sys_depart sd ON sud.dep_id=sd.id AND sd.org_id=#{orgId} WHERE sud.user_id IN
#{item}
